Posts.EditableText:
Development time or game-play time?

Both are as silly as the last.

Development time - you may have had a bad time recently and only been able to do a small amount of work in 3 months, making the game nothing in that amount of time. Also time spend on a game once again <> good game.

Game-play time - is totally up to the player. They can go at their own pace through the game, and either take 20 hours doing a game or 20 minutes.
